SeaPlayer

## DescriptionsSeaPlayer is a player that works in the terminal. Works with `MP3`, `OGG`, `WAV`, `MIDI` and `FLAC` files.## Install1. You can use [Release](https://github.com/romanin-rf/sea-player/releases)2. ***Download clone repository*** install the dependencies from `requirements.txt` and run via [Python](https://www.python.org).3. ``` pip install --upgrade seaplayer ```### For MIDI playback***If you have Windows*** you can skip this part as ***Windows*** has a default decoder for `MIDI` and ***does not need to be installed***.***For Linux or MacOS users:***You need to [install the FluidSynth](https://github.com/FluidSynth/fluidsynth/wiki/Download) package in order to playback `MIDI`.## Using```shellpython -m seaplayer # Method for `downloaded repository` or `installed via pip````![MainScreen-v0.5.4](https://github.com/romanin-rf/SeaPlayer/assets/60302782/5be6c2cb-5602-4c85-a3be-ae36a90e71e4)![ConfigurateScreen-v0.5.4](https://github.com/romanin-rf/SeaPlayer/assets/60302782/922c7112-2259-47d1-9619-488855e14c2c)
